src:
Gempa M 3,5 Terjadi di Maluku
01 Nov 2019, 09:24 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - Gempa bumi dengan magnitudo 3,5 terjadi di Kabupaten Seram Bagian Barat, Maluku. Gempa ini dilaporkan tak berpotensi menimbulkan tsunami.
BMKG lewat akun Twitter @infoBMKG menginformasikan gempa terjadi pada Jumat (1/11/2019) pukul 08.35 WIB. Lokasi pusat gempa ada di koordinat 2,88 Lintang Selatan dan 128,46 Bujur Timur.
Pusat gempa ada di darat, 36 km arah timur laut Piru. Pusat gempa ada di kedalaman 10 km.
Getaran gempa dirasakan di Taniwel, Kabupaten Seram Bagian Barat, dalam skala III MMI. Artinya getaran gempa ini dirasakan nyata dalam rumah seakan-akan ada truk berlalu.
Belum ada laporan mengenai dampak gempa ini.

(jbr/eva)
text:
3.5 M earthquake occurred in Maluku
01 Nov 2019, 09:24 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - An earthquake with a magnitude of 3.5 occurred in West Seram District, Maluku. This earthquake was reported as not having the potential to cause a tsunami.
BMKG via Twitter account @infoBMKG informs that the earthquake occurred on Friday (11/01/2019) at 08.35 WIB. The location of the epicenter was 2.88 south latitude and 128.46 east longitude.
The epicenter was on land, 36 km northeast of Piru. The epicenter was at a depth of 10 km.
The tremor was felt in Taniwel, West Seram Regency, on a MMI III scale. This means that the tremor felt as real in the house as if a truck had passed.
There have been no reports of the impact of this earthquake.

(jbr / eva)
